UserStory,273762,"[B2B][Neverfail][Outlets] As a customer, I want On Hold status to be splitted","<div>
On hold status should be splitted into 2 different statuses:

column2: • Customer should be able to login but not checkout when outlet is Inactive or Suspended
<li>After login customer should see different notification if their outlet is Inactive or Suspended:

column3: • Inactive: 'Your account is currently inactive and you will not be able to place an order at this stage. Please call us on 13 30 37 or Live Chat.'
• Suspended: 'Your account is currently suspended and you will not be able to place an order at this stage. Please call us on 13 30 37 or Live Chat.'
• Messages should be shown as inline errors at the top of the screen

column2: • Address should be not selectable and customer should see a notification adjacent to address (in dropdown) on checkout
• Master user should be able to see outlet statuses in outlet lists on checkout and in My Account

UserStory,273678,"[Filter Bundle] As an admin, I want filtering by date to be extended","
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:

column5: • 'extended more' and 'extended less than' views should be added
<li> For this default 'more' and 'less than' vies should be used and extended with:

column7: • allows to select if the defined number of days/weeks/months should be added or excluded of the selected date
• The next day after the selected date should be taken as the starting point

column5: • 'extended more or equals' and 'extended less or equals' views should be added
<li> For this default 'more' and 'less than' vies should be used and extended with:

column7: <li>allows to select if the defined number of days/weeks/months should be added or excluded of the selected date

column8: • If selected 'Plus' then next day after the selected date should be taken as the starting point
• If selected 'Minus' then previous day before the selected date should be taken as the starting point
